1.0.name: wordpress/scrapbook
1.0.description: A light, graphical, theme designed to informally highlight your images via Image and Gallery post formats. Additional features include enhanced accessibility, customised attachment and thickbox-enabled image templates plus page templates with, and without, comments. Support available on Quirm.net.
